generated_doNotEdit.title: Trusting
generated_doNotEdit.description: Defines the rules for a mob to trust players.

fields.title: Probability
fields.description: The chance of the entity trusting with each item use between 0.0 and 1.0, where 1.0 is 100%.

fields.title: Trust Event
fields.description: Event to run when this entity becomes trusting.

fields.title: Trust Items
fields.description: The list of items that can be used to get the entity to trust players.
